name: Brooke
introduction: White Crane in the Clouds, Guardian DPS
description: A sincere and mature 16-year-old girl without any desires. There is a mysterious power from the East surrounding her.

passiveSkill.name: Selfless Heart
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Brooke absorbs the qi of heaven and earth when she appears, restoring {placeholder} Rage to the partner directly behind her."}

uniqueSkill.name: Loyal Hatchet
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Brooke deals ATK *  {placeholder} damage to a row of enemies. This damage includes ATK * {placeholder} damage of the partner directly behind Brooke."}

specialSkill.name: Crane Wings
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Deals {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Grants a random allied partner a shield with a durability of 10% of max HP. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Golden Light Mudra
normalSkill.description: Brooke deals {placeholder} damage to single enemy.

templateData.lens4.skill: Brooke deals ATK *  {placeholder} damage to a row of enemies. This damage includes ATK * {placeholder} damage of the partner directly behind Brooke.
templateData.lens5.skill: Brooke absorbs the qi of heaven and earth when she appears, restoring {placeholder} Rage to the partner directly behind her.
templateData.lens6.skill: Deals {placeholder} damage to a column of enemies. Grants a random allied partner a shield with a durability of 10% of max HP. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}
